endpoints.description: Retrieve the current inventory levels for all products across all locations.
Trigger a manual check for inventory accuracy at specified locations.
Fetch a list of all store locations managed by the retailer.
Update the inventory stock level for a specific product at a specific location.
Remove a store location from the inventory management system.
Retrieve the current status of restocking processes for specific products.
Submit data for demand forecast analysis and receive predictive insights.
Configure alert thresholds for low stock levels per product.
Obtain tracking information for inventory shipments in transit.
Export the inventory and sales data for external processing.
